EXPERIENCE

2017-pr      Senior Process Engineer, Intel
2014-17       Lawrence Scholar Fellow, Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory
2011-14       Graduate Research Assistant under Dr. Lin Shao, Texas A&M University
2008-11       Undergraduate Researcher in Nuclear Engineering, Texas A&M University

EDUCATION

2018-pr        M.S., Computer Science, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA
2011-17        Ph.D., Nuclear Engineering, Texas A&M University, College Station, TX

CONFERENCE PRESENTATIONS

  1. 2016 MRS Spring Meeting, Phoenix, AZ. Symposium EE: Radiation Damage in Materials- A Grand Multiscale Challenge. Dominant role of Vacancy and Interstitial Diffusion in Dynamic Annealing in Ion-Irradiated Si
  2. 2016 CAARI Conference, Fort Worth, TX. Symposium RE-04: Radiation Response of Materials Toward Reactor Applications. Radiation defect dynamics studied by pulsed ion beams
  3. 2015 MRS Spring Meeting, San Francisco, CA. Symposium XX: Multiscale Modeling and Experiments on Microstructural Evolution in Nuclear Materials. Dynamics of Radiation Defect Production Studied by Pulsed Ion Beams
  4. 2014 CAARI Conference, San Antonio, TX. Symposium NST03: Graphene, Carbon Nanotubes and Composites. Radiation effects on nano mechanics of low dimensional carbon systems.

SELECTED JOURNAL PUBLICATIONS

  1. J. B. Wallace, L. B. Bayu Aji, L. Shao, and S. O. Kucheyev. “Deterministic Role of Collision Cascade Density in Radiation Defect Dynamics in Si”, Phys. Rev. Lett. 120, 216101 (2018).
  2. L. B. Bayu Aji, J. B. Wallace, L. Shao, and S. O. Kucheyev. “Radiation defect dynamics in GaAs studied by pulsed ion beams”, J. Appl. Phys. 124, 025701 (2017).
  3. J. B. Wallace, L. B. Bayu Aji, A. A. Martin, S. J. Shin, L. Shao, and S. O. Kucheyev. “Fractal analysis of collision cascades in pulsed-ion-beam-irradiated solids”, Sci. Rep. 7, 17574 (2017).
  4. J. B. Wallace, L. B. Bayu Aji, L. Shao, and S. O. Kucheyev. “Dynamic annealing in Ge studied by pulsed ion beams.”, Sci. Rep. 7, 13182 (2017).
  5. L. B. Bayu Aji, J. B. Wallace, L. Shao, and S. O. Kucheyev. “Effects of collision cascade density on radiation defect dynamics in 3C-SiC”, Sci. Rep. 7, 44703 (2017).
  6. J.B. Wallace, L.B. Bayu Aji, L. Shao, and S.O. Kucheyev. "Radiation defect dynamics studied by pulsed ion beams", Nucl. Instrum. Methods. Phys. Res. B 409, 347 (2017).
  7. J. B. Wallace, L. B. Bayu Aji, A. A. Martin, S. J. Shin, L. Shao, and S. O. Kucheyev. “The role of Frenkel defect diffusion in dynamic annealing in ion-irradiated Si”, Sci. Rep. 7, 39754 (2017).
  8. L. B. Bayu Aji, J. B. Wallace, L. Shao, and S. O. Kucheyev. “Non-monotonic temperature dependence of radiation defect dynamics in silicon carbide”, Sci. Rep. 6, 30931 (2016).
  9. L. B. Bayu Aji, J. B. Wallace, L. Shao, and S. O. Kucheyev. "Effective defect diffusion lengths in Ar-ion bombarded 3C-SiC", J. Phys. D: Appl. Phys. 49, 19LT01 (2016).
  10. J.B. Wallace, S. Charnvanichborikarn, L.B. Bayu Aji, M.T. Myers, L. Shao, and S.O. Kucheyev. "Radiation defect dynamics in Si at room temperature studied by pulsed ion beams", J. Appl. Phys. 118, 135709 (2015).
  11. J.B. Wallace, L.B. Bayu Aji, T.T. Li, L. Shao, and S.O. Kucheyev. "Damage buildup in Ar-ion-irradiated 3C-SiC at elevated temperatures", J. Appl. Phys. 118, 105705 (2015).
  12. J.B. Wallace, L.B. Bayu Aji, L. Shao, and S.O. Kucheyev. "Time constant of defect relaxation in ion-irradiated 3C-SiC", Appl. Phys. Lett. 106, 202102 (2015).
  13. J. Wang, D. Chen, J.B. Wallace, J. Gigax, X. Wang and, L. Shao. "Introducing thermally stable inter-tube defects to assist off-axial phonon transport in carbon nanotube films", Appl. Phys. Lett. 104, 191902 (2014).
  14. J.B. Wallace, D. Chen and, L. Shao. "Carbon Displacement-Induced Single Carbon Atomic Chain Formation and its Effects on Sliding of SiC Fibers in SiC/graphene/SiC Composite", Mater. Res. Lett. 4, 55 (2015).
  15. J.B. Wallace and L. Shao. "Defect-induced carbon nanoscroll formation", Carbon 91, 96 (2015).
  16. J.B. Wallace, D. Chen, J. Wang and, L. Shao. "Molecular dynamics simulation of damage cascade creation in SiC composites containing SiC/graphite interface", Nucl. Instrum. Methods. Phys. Res. B 307, 81 (2013).
    17. *See ResearchGate For a complete update to date list.
